oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Samuel Pickens Oath of Identity, June 10, 1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mustering Officer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oath of Identity. Samuel Pickens, Private, Capt. E. Goddard's Company (Co. A), 3rd Regiment of Tennessee Cavalry Volunteers. Served September 10, 18863 - June 10, 1865. Discharged at Nashville, Tennessee, by reason of Genl. Order No. 77 War Dept. AGO 1865. Signed document. Printed form filled in by hand; includes age (27) and physical description.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military discharges; Civil wars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Historical Photographs Copy Project (scan only; original returned to owner)
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
